results.title: Resveratrol-mediated cardioprotection against myocardial ischemia-reperfusion injury was revoked by statin-induced mitochondrial alterations.
results.text_hl: The animals treated with statin demonstrated higher @<m>DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IR injury@@@ (measured via low rate pressure product (88.4%), increased histological alterations, prominent @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial dysfunction@@@ (NQR: @<m>DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IR@@@-72%, Stat @<m>DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IR@@@-67%; SQR: @<m>DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IR@@@-71%, Stat @<m>DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IR@@@-74%; @GENE_CPOX @GENE_304024 @@@COX@@@: @<m>DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IR@@@-58%, Stat @<m>DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IR@@@-52%) than the normal @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ heart underwent similar protocols.
